Mehh he literally sold his wife to clear his debt but if someone even asked me if they could fuck my wife, I would beat them within an inch of their life. This is your typical japanese cuck tho, no wonder the birth rate declined, probably only holding together thanks to irl ntr and debt increasing it's chances.

Like "look at me, I'm better than you because I self insert as the ugly bastard. shut up cucks, I'm a sigma male and you're a beta orbiter". Dude you're literally in nhentai, chill and let people debate about the plot, pineapple on pizza or whatever. Also, I really like the author, his art is very nice. Specially the boobies

So according to this boss... the cost of that great debt is a few nights with someone else's wife???? If the debt was THAT large, couldn't he afford a harem full of hostesses??? Even NTR has to make sense...

Moths debt is fake the manager allied and planted the idea his head you know how Ik it’s tactic one of my friends manager did to one of our friends how I found out I visited his house to make sure the manager did nothing and he was caught in the act and he knows what I did in highschool a lot sports and working out and Ik he had Injury on his leg because one my friends didn’t like how he was talking about his wife short version i was there and I told
Him to piss off or dig his grave because I don’t care if I go jail I’m going enjoy killing a parasite he ran out I woke up my friend I told
Him we should hang up on the parasite I five friends two in the marines two boxers one marital artist and me I did football and boxing and baseball and soccer and teach what I’m saying out of all of us we hanged up on him beat the shit out of him and exposed his ass he got fired and we found he has done this before so made sure he will never do it again he dead due to karma

the husband is a shit for not taking resposibility for his mistake  just one job theres a lot of other jobs but losing a loving wife fuck you husband of the wife i like the art but not the ntr

@narkirsub: Exactly. MC is a selfish dumbass that can't take responsibility for his own mistakes. Everyone makes mistakes, including myself. I've made some mistakes at my previous job, I paid for the damages myself; no one else should ever cover for me. My company said it's OK they will cover for me, I stopped them and told them I pay for my own mistakes. So, throughout this entire series, I did not feel a bit of compassion for this fool, nor this hungry-4-cocks slut wife. Now, apart from that, the art is pretty good, fappable at some points, but the story is, as usual, the classic NTRash.
Oohh that gave me a boner of a lifetime 7/10 would fap again ... im sorry i just like seeing people suffering
